turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok i want to order a drink from the starbucks on racho in taylor mi

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what do you want to order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i want a venti Citrus Defender tea

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok Citrus Defender, what do you want init

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i want 4 sugars, if they have the pure cane sugar i want that but if not then the regular sugar is ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, they have the pure cane sugar, so 4 pure cane sugars, what else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and i want extra honey in the tea

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, extra honey will be extra charge, is taht oke

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how much extra is the extra honey

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the regular is no charge, the extra is $1.00 more

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok hmmm, lets do that then, extra $1 is fine with me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok then, Citrus Defender with 4 pure cane sugars and extra honey

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yeah that sounds about rigth

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: actually, lets make that two of those, same for both though

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so we have rwo Citrus Defender with 4 pure cane sugars and extra honey

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, that is it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok placing the order now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is going to be $8.66

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it should be ready for pick up shortly, the reciept will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok thanks, goobdbye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: goodbye
